abstract: All relevant ethical guidelines have been followed; any necessary IRB and/or ethics committee approvals have been obtained and details of the IRB/oversight body are included in the manuscript.
affiliations: Renmin Hospital of Wuhan University, Wuhan, China
author: Weixing Wang; Jia Yu; Xiaoyi Zhang; Chen Chen; Peng Hu; Jiarui Feng; Kailiang Zhao; Qiao Shi; Kaiping Zhao; Xiaoyan Chen; Fang Jiang; Man Li; Fang Liu; Yupu Hong
title: Clinical characteristics of 101 COVID-19 nonsurvivors in Wuhan, China: a retrospective study
